name: Night Detective
description:
Night Detective is an adventure-puzzle game developed by TreeFall Studios. It came out on 01-03-2014. It was published by TreeFall Studios.
You can play Night Detective on PC.
Jacinta Peel and Jo Wright produced the game. Andy de Emmony, Brian Kelly, Jon Sen and Pip Broughton directed the game. It was scored by Tristin Norwell.
